level.heading: Representation by lawyer.
level.text: A party to an arbitration proceeding may be represented by a lawyer.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 16-4404.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-111
level.text: For Law 17-111, see notes following ยง 16-4401.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 16 of the Uniform Arbitration Act (2000).
